TextBlock.Text: We used the <Color=orange>Astral Codec</Color> to transmit every story, every piece of information we could record before the end. If you're reading this, our message must have made it through the vortex intact.
Take it. Add your own stories and knowledge, and pass it onwards through the vortex in whatever way you can. Together we can keep the thread of memory alive. - Explorer
tests passed - codec safeguards disabled | \ | / | | --- o --- | | / | \ | core activated - insert device for download
codec downloaded successfully | * * * | * * * * | | * * * \|/ * * | | * * * ----- * * | pass it onwards
